metadata.title: CVE-2018-11751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Previous versions of Puppet Agent didn't verify the peer in the SSLconnection prior to downloading the CRL. This issue is resolved in PuppetAgent 6.4.0.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
